ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:59:43 [Issue ID 4000-118672] urn:comicvine:4000-118672 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 01:27:50. [Issue ID 118672]
ComicInfo.Summary: Nicolleta is kidnapped and Jackie discovers his own grandmother is behind the kidnapping; She is also behind the contract to kill Jackie because she wants all the power of the Darkness returned to her; But her scheme will only work if Jackie is killed on December 21st while the sun is up; Since the sun is down, she has lost her chance but vows to try again in one year.
